column4: Qualcomm accuses tech group of 'misdirecting' trade regulators
column5: July 24 Qualcomm Inc fired back in its case against Apple Inc on Monday  accusing its critics of waging a "coordinated effort aimed at misdirecting" trade regulators.

column4: Samsung takes aim at TSMC with plans to triple chip foundry market share
column5: YONGIN  SOUTH KOREA Samsung Electronics  plans to triple the market share of its contract chip manufacturing business within the next five years by aggressively adding clients  a senior company executive said  as it targets new growth drivers for the chips business.
